WINES & CHAMPAGNE
TWA has selected these fine beverages.

18,72
CORDIER

LABOTTIÈRE
SOAVE
BOLLA
ONCEO AT OTE ER CASSO ZONE
Your flight includes selections from TWA's
American Harvest Service which features
seasonal foods from our country's rich
bounty. During autumn the abundance of our
land is reflected everywhere in the traditional
harvest season. As early winter approaches
the harvest continues, moving toward our
southerly boundries. We pay tribute to
American cuisine by including some recipe
ideas from TWA cities throughout the country,
and from the American Harvest Restaurants
in the Vista International Hotels.
GREEK SALAD
Athenian Dressing.
ENTREE SELECTIONS
CHICKEN CONQUISTADOR
Served with Green Beans
and Sofrito flavored Rice.
AMERICAN HARVEST CANNELLONI
Filled Spinach Pasta Roll and
Egg Pasta Roll topped with
Herbed California Tomato Sauce ...
Peas with Mushrooms.
One of these Desserts will be offered ..
either Island Fruit Cake, Ultra
Chocolate Chocolate Chip Square
or Today's Fruit Tart.
COFFEE FLAVORS
OF THE WORLD $2.50
MILANO with Amaretto di Saronno
ROYALE with Remy Martin V.S.O.P.
TENNESSEE with Jack Daniels
ISLAND with Rum CAROLANS IRISH
Please accept our apologies if due to previous
passenger selections, your entree preference is
not available.
FROM TWA's RECIPE FILES
ULTRA CHOCOLATE
CHOCOLATE CHIP MUFFINS
tbsp. cocoa
2-1/2
tbsp. sugar
1/2
tbsp. water
cup milk
eggs
cup sugar
1/2
cup shortening
tsp. vanilla
1/2
cup flour
1/2
tsp. cream of tartar
tsp. salt
1/2
tsp. baking soda
3/4
cup chocolate chips
24
muffin cups
1. Cook cocoa with 2 1/2 tbsp. sugar and water until
thick in double boiler. Remove from heat, stir in milk.
2. Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff. Beat in
gradually 1/2 cup sugar.
3. Cream together until light shortening, vanilla and
1/2 cup sugar.
4. Beat in yolks one at a time and add cocoa mixture.
5. Sift dry ingredients, beat into batter and fold in egg
whites.
6. Spoon batter half full into muffin cups. Sprinkle with
chocolate chips. Bake 20-25 minutes in preheated
350° oven
Yields 24 muffins

diet

LEMONADE FLAVOR DRINK

compliments.
PRIOR TO ARRIVAL
A Morning Snack of Juice, Pastry and Coffee.
